descriptionHtml:
This mod is an addition to my first mod (Killbane Sword (not required for this mod)) which is an Stronger Glassarmor with enchantment.

- craftable and upgradeable (glassarmor perk required)

Installation:Â 
Put Killbane_armor.esb into your data folder.

Have fun with the mod and please leave suggestions for improvement ;D

[color=#00ff00]Also feel free to try my new Mod:[/color]
